item.title: ReCF: Exploiting Response Reasoning for Correlation Filters in Real-Time UAV Tracking

item.title: ReSL: Rethinking Scale Learning in Correlation Filters for Real-time UAV Tracking
item.description: A comparison between aspect adaptive trackers

item.title: Towards Robust Visual Tracking for Unmanned Aerial Vehicle with Tri-Attentional Correlation Filters

item.title: Exploiting Interval-Based Response Inconsistency for Correlation Filters in Real-Time UAV Tracking

item.description: Comparison between discriminative correlation filter (DCF) and the proposed BiCF

item.title: TOT: Target-oriented UAV Tracking via Multi-feature Inconsistency Mining
item.description: The visualization of maximum values on different feature response maps.

item.title: Robust Multi-Kernelized Correlators for UAV Tracking with Adaptive Context Analysis and Dynamic Weighted Filters
item.description:
Main structure of the proposed tracking approach

item.title: Sample Purification-Aware Correlation Filters for UAV Tracking with Cooperative Deep Features
